Posted By: NinjaShadow (2/26/2012 5:56:23 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Still think if a Ravnican Batman were made, it would get a 5/5.  
  
But I thought of a better comment on this card:  
  
[Drogskol Captain](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Drogskol Captain). Because fu\*k you.  
  
It's combos like that that make me wanna say....SCOOBY DOO, WHERE ARE YOU?! =O  
  
(yeah oops I said Diregraf the first time bc I was confusing the colors. It is worth splashing into 3 colors to do this though, and then you have an excuse to run [Punish Ignorance](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Punish Ignorance) :)
